# Security Policy

## Reporting Security Vulnerabilities

If you discover a security vulnerability in Alchemy, please report it by opening a private security advisory at:

https://github.com/tunahorse/alchemy-rs/security/advisories/new

Please do not open public issues for security vulnerabilities.

## Security Features

This repository uses the following GitHub security features:

- **Secret Scanning**: Enabled to detect committed secrets automatically
- **Code Scanning**: CodeQL analysis runs on every PR and push to main
- **Dependency Review**: Dependabot alerts for vulnerable dependencies
- **Branch Protection**: Enforces PR reviews and status checks on main

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.1   | :x:                |
